titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

body.p: I left Birchington after breakfast by a train which left at 9.12 a.m., and reached Victoria at 11.27 a.m. I went to King's Cross, and travelled to Bishop Auckland by the express which left at 1.20 p.m. and arrived shortly after 7 p.m. After dinner I went through the correspondence which had accumulated.
